Actions.Name: Add Member to Space
Actions.Description: Add a member to an existing space

Actions.Name: Add Member to Team
Actions.Description: Add a member to a team

Actions.Name: Get Message Details
Actions.Description: Shows details for a message, by message ID.

Actions.Name: Get Messages
Actions.Description: Get a list of recent messages for a space

Actions.Name: Get People
Actions.Description: Lookup details and presence information for people in your organization

Actions.Name: Get Space Details
Actions.Description: Return details of a given space

Actions.Name: Get Spaces List
Actions.Description: This action retrieves a list of spaces

Actions.Name: When a membership is created
Actions.Description: Someone joined a room that you're in or you've been added to a new room

Actions.Name: When a membership is deleted
Actions.Description: Someone left or was kicked out of a room that you're in, or you left or were removed from a room; only triggers for group rooms, not 1-to-1 rooms

Actions.Name: When a membership is updated
Actions.Description: Someone's membership was updated in a room that you're in; primarily used to detect moderator changes

Actions.Name: When a message is created
Actions.Description: New message posted into a room that you're in

Actions.Name: When a message is deleted
Actions.Description: A message was deleted from a room that you're in

Actions.Name: When a space is created
Actions.Description: A new space was created by you or one of your integrations

Actions.Name: When a space is updated
Actions.Description: A space that you're in was updated; primarily used to detect when a space becomes Locked or Unlocked
